fields.name: passport
fields.label: Passport
fields.hint: Upload a clear copy of your passport bio page

fields.name: address
fields.label: Current Address
fields.hint: Include both U.S. and foreign address if applicable

criteria.name: Critical Role
criteria.guidance: Document roles where you held significant responsibility and influence within well-regarded companies or organizations.

fields.name: key_responsibilities
fields.label: Key Responsibilities
fields.hint: Describe your role, team size, and impact on the organization

fields.name: examples
fields.label: Supporting Evidence
fields.hint: Product roadmaps, technical diagrams, speaking invites, blog posts, dashboards showing project ownership

criteria.name: High Remuneration
criteria.description: Compensation significantly above average for your field
criteria.guidance: Demonstrate that your salary and total compensation place you in the top tier of your profession.

fields.name: equity_proof
fields.label: Equity Documentation
fields.hint: Carta screenshot, offer letter showing equity, or cap table

criteria.name: Original Contributions
criteria.description: Original work with significant impact on your field
criteria.guidance: Show how your work has advanced your field and been recognized by others.

fields.name: work_description
fields.label: Describe Your Work
fields.hint: What did you create or contribute that was original and innovative?

fields.name: impact_description
fields.label: Impact on the Field
fields.hint: How has your work influenced the industry or community? Include metrics if possible.

fields.name: supporting_evidence
fields.label: Supporting Evidence
fields.hint: GitHub repositories, technical blog posts, conference talks, citations, adoption metrics

criteria.name: Membership
criteria.description: Membership in organizations requiring outstanding achievement
criteria.guidance: Document memberships in selective organizations that require demonstrated excellence.

fields.name: proof_of_membership
fields.label: Proof of Membership
fields.hint: Acceptance letter, certificate, or official documentation
